channel.title: Russian dedicated server
channel.description:
Greetings.
Looking to see if anyone has done this, before I purchase a dedicated server located in Russia will the recent VPN/TOR ban over there stop me from using Whonix on it for a) Browsing b) Hosting a hidden service.
Regards
